allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add missing frontend lib files to git

- Update .gitignore to not ignore frontend src/lib directory
- Add all lib files that were previously ignored

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve React Hook conditional call error in TiptapEditor

- Move useCallback before the early return to comply with React Hooks rules
- Hooks must be called in the same order on every render

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: change null to undefined for detail_content_id type compatibility

- Fix TypeScript error: Type ''null'' is not assignable to type ''number | undefined''

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(del admin.ts api.ts database.ts middlewares.ts plugins.ts server.ts)
